title: importing font from Illistrator
content: Why when I copy and paste one of my characters from Illistrator to FontLab, I only see the outlines? What do I need to do in order to see the fills?
author: erinww

comments.content:
VIEW-LAYERS-FONT AUDIT

A little red arrow will tell you that the contour is not closed. Click "FIC."
Just click the "draw filled" button rather than "draw outlines" ...
